project.name: Computer Kurzweil
project.description: Computer Science InfotainmentComputer Science Infotainment. A Tribute to the "Computer Kurzweil" named Article Series in Spektrum der Wissenschaft which is the german release of Scientific American. The Article Series "Computer Kurzweil" were also published as Books. Content: Cellular Automata, Fractal Geometry, Artficial Life, Simulation, Automata and Turing Machines, Systems Theory.

build.defaultGoal: clean dependency:resolve dependency:resolve-plugins dependency:sources install site site:deploy exec:java
